review: it is based on commercially successful malayalam comedy 'ishtam'. it's a typical priyadarshan movie with actors like akshye khanna, om puri, paresh rawal. the father-son duo of akshye khanna and paresh rawal has great chemistry (especially the cheeky loud punches of akshye) and om puri's supporting role was even funnier. it's first half was fun. second half added an emotional layer to the story. it doesn't have a 'great' soundtrack but i liked "maine hawaii ke patron pe likha hai". although a different kind of story of that time(2008) but all in all it was a "fresh comedy".
